name: Dead Presents
description:
In Dead Presents you shoot Zombies with your beloved shotgun and build presents from their bodys by putting your constructs into the wrapping machine! The goal is to achieve the highest score possible by building the weirdest constructs out of zombies.

This game was developed for the GDL Christmas Jam 2019.

Controls

Movement
   W - Forward
   S - Backward
   A - Left
   D - Right
   Left Shift - Sprint
   Space - Jump

Shotgun
   Left Click - Shoot
   Right Click (hold) - Aim

Other
   E - Grab/Drop/Attach to different part
   Aim in Air - Slow Motion

Tip: Use your shotgun to jump even higher!

Credits
Programmers & Level Designer
    Kipoka, Jlot

Art & Sound (https://opengameart.org/)
   Cartoon Zombie - Vinrax
   Shotgun - MikeMoon
   Gift Box - Clint Bellanger
   Modular Medieval House Pack 2 - hreikin
   3D Road Tile Pack - Kenney
   Arrow Symbols - Savino
   Ordinary House - drummyfish
   UI Button - StumpyStrust
   Shotgun Shoot + Reload - Mike Koenig (Soundbible)

Thank you for playing! Have fun!
